participant_1.background:
I work hard to provide for my family.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
I am a busy person who enjoys my downtime on weekends.

participant_2.background:
I want to start working on my prototype.
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
My biggest fear is that something will happen to my kids.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I love to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together.

content.text: Not much, just trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
That's tough. What are you thinking about?
I'm not sure. I want to start working on my prototype, but I'm also not sure if I want to start my own business.
That's a big decision. What are some of the pros and cons of each?
Well, if I start my own business, I'll have more control over my work, but I'll also have more risk.
That's true. And it's a lot of work to start your own business.
Yeah, I know. I'm not sure if I'm ready for that.
Well, you could always start working for someone else and get some experience first.
That's a good idea. I'll think about that.
Cool. Let me know if you have any other questions.
